History

0.1.0 (2020-06-30)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.2.0 (2020-10-02)
------------------

* Added all the stuff from the implementation phase of the bachelor thesis
* Documentation

    * Added a chapter for advanced topics
    * Added a chapter for a command line interface
